DOC.brief_title: Durability Flexible Ureteroscopes Causes Infection During Flexible Ureterorenoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study data consecutive patient undergo ureterorenoscopy use flexible ureterorenoscope collect . In total 4 new ureteroscopes use ( 2 Olympus 2 Storz ) study durability ureteroscopes possible microbiological load . Before procedure start endoscope test microbiological load two different way : Shake tip flexible ureterorenoscope 5 second sterile container fill 100 cc NaCl 0.9 % Using well-fitting single use sterile brush sponge brush biopsy channel . Shake brush 5 second sterile container fill 100 cc NaCL 0.9 % . After procedure finish , endoscope test microbiological load two different way : Shake tip flexible ureterorenoscope 5 second sterile container fill 100 cc NaCl 0.9 % Using well-fitting single use sterile brush sponge brush biopsy channel . Shake brush 5 second sterile container fill 100 cc NaCL 0.9 % Before dismissal hospital first visit patient outpatient clinic : Sample urine culture measure temperature patient Mark date sample . Complete lab form require information reason sampling . Transfer sample lab soon possible least within four hour collect sample . As clinical efficacy procedure detail questionnaire use ureteroscope fill . This include ease use make mention quality image , torque , flexibility durability . Data collect electronic case report form ( eCFRs ) , use online Data Management system ( DMS ) .
DOC.criteria: Patient present diagnosis undergo ureterorenoscopy use flexible ureterorenoscope 18 year sign informed consent patient treat designate flexible ureterorenoscope chronic urinary tract infection indwell nefrodrain JJ stent bladder catheter .
